Suitable for all skin tones and types, including sensitive skin.                         "                        

Clinical Results: In a clinical study, dermatological scoring on dark spot coloration, on 65 volunteers after 56 days:
- Dark Spots visibly reduced by 63% after 1 bottle on all skin tones and by 81% on phototypes 4, 5, and 6

In a clinical study, dermatological scoring on dark spot coloration, on 65 volunteers, after 7 days:
- Dark spots visibly brightened by 25%

- 62 times more effective than Vitamin C to brighten

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.




Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

alpyn beauty is the first and only skincare brand to sustainably harvest wild plants from the mountains of Jackson Hole, Wyoming and infuse them into their formulas. alpyn beauty is committed to sustainability through partnerships like 1% For the Planet, where a portion of every purchase goes directly to forest restoration efforts. To date, over 900 acres of wildlife-dependent grasslands have been restored.

and restoring bounce.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily




Skincare Concerns: Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes




Formulation: Lightweight Serum

- Saffron: A powerful antioxidant known for its ability to reduce the appearance of dark spots and prevent the signs of aging.

- Lotus Flower: Helps reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation & dark spots for an even complexion.

- Turmeric: Helps soothe visible irritation and redness for glowing, luminous skin.




Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.




What Else You Need to Know: The nourishing formula is infused with revitalizing Ayurvedic ingredients that immediately leave your skin with a healthy glow. Our fast absorbing oil-based serum is formulated for maximum potency and is suitable for all skin types, including oily and troubled skin.




Research Results:

In an independent clinical study of 32 subjects, after 4 weeks:




- 100% of subjects demonstrated a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- 78% of subjects demonstrated a statistical reduction in hyperpigmentation boosting overall skin luminosity and radiance




In a consumer perception study of 29 participants, after 4 weeks reported:




- 93% agree skin is more radiant and dewier

- 90% agree there has been a visible improvement in skin complexion







CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation).

-92% agreed the look of dullness was improved










CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.

product_name: Mini Retinol Reform®
product_description:

This serum is clinically shown to improve texture in two weeks and reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles in eight weeks.

- Participants saw visible brightening in as few as two weeks

In a scientific study of 35 women:
- 93% of subjects saw an improvement in texture
- 90% of subjects reported a more even skin tone
- 83% of subjects said their skin looks brighter

product_name: Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20% in Vitamin F
product_description:
Which skin type is it good for?

✔ Normal

✔ Oily

✔ Combination

✔ Dry

✔ Sensitive




What it is:

A high-strength oil solution with vitamin C derivative and essential fatty acids.




Solutions for:

- Dullness and uneven texture

- Uneven skin tone

- Fine lines and wrinkles




If you want to know more…

Vitamin C acts as an effective antioxidant, brightens the skin tone, and reduces visible signs of aging. Ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate is an oil-soluble and extremely stable derivative of vitamin C. It is provided in this oil format formula in combination with vitamin F, also known as essential fatty acids. product_description:

What Else You Need to Know: Retinol and supportive peptides visibly restore bounce, resilience, and clarity to skin while helping to even tone and texture without redness and irritation. It’s also free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.




Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.




Clinical Results: In a clinical study with 31 people after 8 weeks:

- 100% showed improvement in firmness and elasticity

- 96% showed reduced lines and wrinkles

- 93% showed improvement in texture

What Else You Need to Know: Created with all skin in mind, Babyfacial‘s 25 percent AHA/2 percent BHA blend gently exfoliates the pore lining and resurfaces by removing dead skin cells. With an ideal pH level of 3.5, glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids work together to ensure higher efficacy without visible redness and sensitization.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.




Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Wild nettle, niacinamide, and rambutan—a plant-based retinol alternative—work in harmony to visibly smooth, plump, and moisturize all skin types (even sensitive).




alpyn beauty is the first and only skincare brand to sustainably harvest wild plants from the mountains of Jackson Hole, Wyoming and infuse them into their formulas. These highly resilient and wildly efficacious plants are conditioned to survive in the most extreme climate. When applied to skin, they behave just like they do in the wild: nourishing, protecting and deeply hydrating skin.

alpyn beauty is committed to sustainability through partnerships like 1% For the Planet, where a portion of every purchase goes directly to forest restoration efforts. To date, over 900 acres of wildlife-dependent grasslands have been restored.




Clinical Results: In an independent consumer-testing panel of 30 subjects, over a period of 21 days:

- 100% found the overall clarity of their skin was improved

- 90% agreed their skin felt firm to the touch

- 90% agreed their fine lines and wrinkles were less noticeable

Clean & Planet Aware
Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

What Else You Need to Know: Potent antioxidants, such as astaxanthin, tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate, and ubiquinone, enhance skin’s free radical defenses, while plant oils nourish skin. Umbras are non-pilling, highly blendable, and deliver 100% mineral sun protection that is ideal for daily use on all skin—even sensitive.




Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.




Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study of 55 people after 2 weeks:

- 92% agreed the product applied smoothly and evenly

- 90% agreed the product did not pill while blending into skin

product_description:
What it is: A retinol face oil that minimizes the look of lines, hyperpigmentation, blemishes, and sun damage, locking in moisture and restoring a healthy glow.

- 95% Virgin Marula Oil: High in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 and helps moisturize, nourish, and rejuvenate skin for a youthful glow.

- Ceramides: Help to fill in the spaces between skin cells (giving them elasticity), strengthen the skin barrier, and maintain the moisture balance of skin.




Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.




What Else You Need to Know: Designed for both new and experienced retinol users, A-Gloei™ was created with all skin in mind. Retinol gets a bad rap for being sensitizing, but A- Gloei™ is formulated with soothing marula oil and ceramides to gently deliver retinol to skin, ensuring high efficacy without redness or irritation.




Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.




Free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, irritants, and PEGs.




Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 35 people after 8 weeks:

- 97% agreed skin’s hydration and moisture was improved

- 85% agreed skin’s firmness and elasticity was improved

- 85% agreed A-Gloei restored bounce, resilience, and brighter clarity



CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.

alpyn beauty is the first and only skincare brand to sustainably harvest wild plants from the mountains of Jackson Hole, Wyoming and infuse them into their formulas. These highly resilient and wildly efficacious plants are conditioned to survive in the most extreme climate. When applied to skin, they behave just like they do in the wild: nourishing, protecting and deeply hydrating skin.

alpyn beauty is committed to sustainability through partnerships like 1% For the Planet, where a portion of every purchase goes directly to forest restoration efforts. To date, over 900 acres of wildlife-dependent grasslands have been restored.




Clinical Results: In an independent consumer-testing panel of 32 subjects, after a single 5-minute use:

- 100% agreed their skin felt smoother

- 95% agreed their skin looked brighter and had a more youthful glow

- 91% found their skin looked transformed




Clean & Planet Aware
